title: Pasta sauce with mince
ingredients: ['450g (1 lb) beef mince', '1 onion, chopped', '4 cloves garlic, minced', '1 small green pepper, diced', '2 (400g) tins chopped tomatoes', '1 (500g) jar passata', '150g tomato puree', '2 teaspoons dried oregano', '2 teaspoons dried basil', '1 teaspoon salt', '1/2 teaspoon black pepper']
